post.body: no problem, I had a client who wanted to do a remote w/ their Snowball. Took me 4 hours in post to fix. G/L with the Samson.
unless you want to sit still 3" from the mic do NOT buy a Blue Snowball
@GarnettLee the dfx is kinda misleading. The channel trims are designed for full low = line in, if it works then don't worry
no idea which mackie mixer you are using but it might have a gain staging switch on it for high/low level
I'm willing to bet the problem lies in the preamp, it should have enough headroom though. Those headsets terminate 1/4" or XLR?
what are you recording too?
at what level do you unlock the 'roid rage perk
Had a good time down on Wash Ave, not as good of a time as Dane though lol
I really wish I could sleep right about now...
Thank god I didn't buy that GM stock when I thought it was low, the bottoms going to fall out tomorrow morning! It's gonna be a brutal day!
Relaxing evening with Dr. House followed by some gaming! http://twitpic.com/s3f9
All aboard the Failboat!
No AFTRA lunch for me!! =)
Just bought a copy of Dark Knight on bluray... tonight should be fun=)
Session with Pat & Bill for AT&T... I want to know who writes these scripts?? http://twitpic.com/rf0k
Monday nights at the gym = chest night = pain
Bout to go grab some Pasta House... mmmm
Broadcom announces draft-n wireless for mobile devices? A wireless N 32gig gps 3g iphone with a milled aluminum back would be nice=)
Had a fun day at the range, video shoot coming this afternoon which will take the wind out of my sails haha
My brand new Walther PPK/S http://twitpic.com/qrup
I guess I forgot to mention... Poor Richards tomorrow, Columbia thu/early fri, party at the 3 stooges fri night, and Hoggs party on sat
Feeding my TV addiction, however I will be much more social the next few days than I feel right now
I unlocked 3 Xbox achievements on Call Of Duty: World at War! http://raptr.com/stldave2
Global warming my ass!
Watching Wanted on Bluray... 1080p does Angelina justice
Damn, it's icy out!
Shot real guns in the morning, fake guns in the evening... tore up some COD:WaW with the $tL boys, time for a movie then bed!
Fired a few hundred rounds this morning, now some Little Big Planet with Tony
Another Saturday night complete... Time to rest up before heading to Top Gun to put another couple hundred rounds through the PPK=)
Just got a call, "I just saw you on TV, turn on MTV2"... bringing back good memories from the AKA rally on True Life
Merry Christmas!
It is amazing how quick life can go from awesome to terrible... 2 funerals in one week is 2 too many.
Desperatly trying to sleep, and feeling for my friends who had a terrible day... I'm here for you!
All the ornaments are on the tree, all it needs is beads! I guess I should water it too lol http://twitpic.com/tycw
Weather permitting I'm headed to Columbia for the day/night... Otherwise it's business as usual.
